function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of regulation on air and water quality, leading to negative environmental consequences.","Impact":"Increased risk of pollution-related diseases and environmental degradation.","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations on air and water quality, invest in pollution control technologies and infrastructure.","Technologies":"Air and water quality monitoring systems, pollution control technologies.","People":"Local communities, citizens, and environmental activists.","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental protection organizations."},{"Description":"Industrial towns experiencing unemployment due to the phase-out of polluting industries.","Impact":"Social and economic upheaval, resistance to sustainable transition, and potential increase in poverty.","Mitigation":"Provide subsidy, tax exemptions, and workers' training for transitioning to sustainable sectors, and introduce policies like universal basic income.","Technologies":"Training programs for sustainable sectors, economic transition planning tools.","People":"Workers, local communities, and policymakers.","Owner":"Government agencies, labor organizations."},{"Description":"Resistance to bottom-up planning and cultural preferences impacting environmental adaptation.","Impact":"Inefficient adaptation to local environmental contexts, hindrance to effective environmental planning.","Mitigation":"Promote education and cultural awareness, involve communities in decision-making processes, and provide resources for sustainable adaptation.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, environmental education resources.","People":"Local communities, cultural groups, and environmental decision-makers.","Owner":"Local governments, environmental planning organizations."}]}
